caption.p: Effect of the interventions on total protein and albumin levels. a: comparison between distilled water group and all groups. b: comparison between H 2O 2 group and all groups, c: comparison between H 2O 2 + Argan oil and H 2O 2 + Argan oil + clove essential oil. * p < 0.05, *** p < 0.001. Data are the means of three replicates ( n = 3) and presented as mean Â± SD.
